about_the_game:
The Venture into the enigmatic depths of the Backrooms, As you delve deeper, uncover the mysteries of this sprawling network of interconnected spaces where reality frays at the seams. Some places are a hollow imitation of reality, some a terrifying display of chaos and despair...

You are there not by luck, but you have a mission.
Do anything you must to survive in the ever terraforming world of backrooms.

EXPLORATION

Backrooms Interception has a unique take on the backrooms concept, with a lot of fan favorite levels as well as our original ones that flow with the game's dark story and gameplay. There are many choices to be made; this game is neither linear nor similar to most backrooms games, because it is its own cannon and doesn't conform to the rules of many.
It's up to you to find any means necessary to survive in the twisted world of Backrooms Interception.

ITEMS AND INVENTORY

This world isn't like ours; you will need to scrape anything you can find that can be helpful for your journey in this Dark and unforgiving world. This game won't lead you by hand you will have to learn what it takes to survive in this desolate illusion of reality. Work at your own pace. Food, Water, Materials, and Weapons are crucial for survival, only then can you worry about other things like getting out of there. From torches to backpacks, this game will have you making hard decisions on how you spend your resources.
Will you manage to survive?

COMBAT

Your survival is at stakes every second you spend inside backrooms, safe spaces are as rare as they can be, and you will need to rely on your skills in combat to survive even the smallest of threats as you navigate this world. At your disposal, you will have a lot of choices, from cold weapons like boards and axes to pistols and shotguns, that you might be able to get if you are skilled enough, are you? The entities here won't give you an easy time, they come in all shapes and sizes some are straight up nightmare fuel, while others are mimics of our world waiting for you to turn your back so they can strike.
Be aware and always keep your weapon ready...

ROADMAP

We aim to make the most out of our game, but for that, we will need your support. Our game is planned to have a lot of new and exciting features coming after the release of the Pre-Alpha. We aim to add a lot of things like CO-OP, VR support, and much more content to the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Ryzen 3000 series or Intel equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 580 or Nvidia equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Immerse yourself in a rich Backrooms experience filled with crafting, combat, exploration, and interactions with otherworldly entities. As you progress, a gripping narrative unfolds, revealing secrets hidden within the endless corridors. But be warned danger lurks around every corner.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian
*languages with full audio support
